label: Property Name
description: Legal or marketing name of the property

label: Market/MSA
description: Metropolitan statistical area or market name

label: Listing Brokerage
description: Name of brokerage marketing the property

label: Electric Individually Metered
description: Each unit has separate electric meter

label: Gas Individually Metered
description: Each unit has separate gas meter

label: Water Individually Metered
description: Each unit has separate water meter

label: Price Per Unit
description: Purchase price divided by unit count

label: Price Per SF
description: Purchase price divided by rentable SF

label: Current Cap Rate
description: NOI / Purchase Price based on current income

label: Proforma Cap Rate
description: NOI / Purchase Price based on proforma income

label: Current GRM
description: Gross Rent Multiplier based on current income

label: Proforma GRM
description: Gross Rent Multiplier based on proforma income

label: Assessment Year
description: Year of most recent tax assessment

field_key: # SECTION 4: UNIT MIX / UNIT TYPES (12 fields per type - array extraction)

label: Unit Count by Type
description: Number of units of this type

label: Average SF by Type
description: Average square feet for this unit type

label: Market Rent
description: Current market rent for this unit type

label: Current Average Rent
description: Average in-place rent for this unit type

label: Average Concessions
description: Average concession amount per unit type

label: Total Units by Type
description: Total unit count for this type

label: Unit Type Notes
description: Additional notes about this unit type

label: Other Features
description: Amenities or features specific to unit type

field_key: # SECTION 5: INDIVIDUAL UNITS / RENT ROLL (20 fields per unit - array extraction)

label: Unit Type
description: Unit type classification for this unit

label: Management Fee %
description: Management fee as percentage of EGI

label: Pet Fees/Rent
description: Pet deposits and monthly pet rent

label: Loss to Lease %
description: Current rent vs market rent gap

label: Tax Reassessment %
description: Expected property tax increase at sale

label: RUBS Recovery %
description: Percentage of utilities recovered via RUBS

field_key: # SECTION 10: SALES COMPARABLES (15 fields per comp - array extraction)
# SECTION 11: RENT COMPARABLES (15 fields per comp - array extraction)

label: Closing Costs %
description: Closing costs as percentage of price

label: Land Allocation %
description: Land value as percentage of total

label: Exit Cap Rate Assumption
description: Exit cap rate from acquisition model

label: Disposition Costs %
description: Costs to sell as percentage of price
